name: Lost and Fish (Global Game Jam 2021)
description:
Life is good in your tank.  Your just chilling.  You and your friend.  Where is your friend?  Maybe you should go find him.

Controls

Move - WASD

Rise - E

Lower - Q

Look - Mouse

This game was made for the 2021 Global Game Jam

The theme was Lost and Found

Credits :

Engine - Unity

Dev - Digx7

Music - 

Sleep Mountain: Soothing Piano For Sleeping and Relaxation link
